heroDescription: AI collaboration messenger designed for developers. Complete all collaboration in one platform, from code reviews to smart search and automatic documentation.
featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for seamless collaboration
aiCodeAssistantDesc: AI supports code review, bug detection, and refactoring suggestions in real-time.
semanticSearchDesc: Find code, documents, and conversations instantly with meaning-based search.
autoDocumentationDesc: Automatically generate documentation from code and conversations, building a knowledge base.
gitIntegrationDesc: View and manage PRs, commits, and issues directly in chat.
workflowAutomationDesc: Automate repetitive tasks and integrate with CI/CD pipelines.
enterpriseSecurityDesc: Enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption and SSO.
contextualConversationDesc: AI understands code context and automatically links relevant information.
smartInsightsDesc: Analyzes team collaboration patterns and provides suggestions to boost productivity.
autoTaskManagementDesc: Automatically extracts action items from conversations and suggests priorities.
chatDemoDeveloperMsg: Any way to optimize this function?
chatDemoAIMsg: Sure, here are a few optimization methods:
chatDemoAIPoint2: 2. Improve time complexity O(n²) → O(n log n)
ctaSubtitle: Your entire team can start collaborating in 5 minutes. No credit card required.
